thread.title: Migos Bet $300,000 on Falcons, Julio Jones Gets ‘Culture’-Themed Cleats, Atlanta Now Compelled to Win Super Bowl
thread.title_full: Migos Bet $300,000 on Falcons, Julio Jones Gets ‘Culture’-Themed Cleats, Atlanta Now Compelled to Win Super Bowl

author: Alex Robert Ross
title: Migos Bet $300,000 on Falcons, Julio Jones Gets ‘Culture’-Themed Cleats, Atlanta Now Compelled to Win Super Bowl
text:
Migos Bet $300,000 on Falcons, Julio Jones Gets ‘Culture’-Themed Cleats, Atlanta Now Compelled to Win Super Bowl 2 Chainz has also dropped money on Atlanta; the good and strong birds now cannot lose. 
It's the weekend after the thrilling Pro Bowl Skills Challenge took over Orlando. We've had a week to process the experience, nurse our hangovers, and realize that we're richer for the memories. Things fell from drones, balls were thrown and dodged, people ran around. Truly, it was a revelation. 
There may not be any drone-related challenges during the Super Bowl tomorrow afternoon, but it should be entertaining enough. And with the good and strong Atlanta Falcons challenging the relentless and potentially evil New England Patriots for some shiny rings, musicians have made their allegiances clear. 
A photo posted by QuavoHuncho (@quavohuncho) on Feb 3, 2017 at 3:44pm PST 
Those right there, according to Quavo, belong to Julio Jones, the Atlanta Falcons' star wide receiver. It's unclear if he'll be wearing his Culture -themed cleats during the game—the NFL hates it when players have fun—but we live in hope. 
According to TMZ , Migos have taken their faith in the Falcons to another level, staking a $300,000 bet on the outcome of the game. They join 2 Chainz in betting on the Falcons, though he wouldn't say how much he'd placed on the game (TMZ refer to it as a "FAT STACK" so I think it's fine to take them at their word). 
The Falcons now cannot lose. 
Follow Noisey on Twitter .
